document.full_text: a sumptuous first recording of a long-lost 450-year-old italian renaissance mass written for 40 different vocal parts has soared onto british pop charts a week after its release.
document.title: "lost" 450-year-old mass soars on british charts
lines_and_colors: a sumptuous first recording of a long-lost 450-year-old italian renaissance mass written for 40 different vocal parts has soared onto british pop charts a week after its release.
